item.title: WebSVN and Mantis integration
item.description: While installing the above I found the following obscure error: The environment under which I run Mantis is a little broken I think and so svn can only work if called with -config-dir /home/svnuser/.subversion otherwise it tries to read /root/.subversion which of course fails Even if the above parameter is set in configuration the svn_check function appears to ignore it and calls svn help without it. Unintuitively svn help fails if it cannot read the configuration folder so the -config-dir must be applied here too.
